Articles.Content:
is there a way to attach the materials.bay to the attachment-pont?

:(

this thing would attach everywhere, but not on this point -.-
Not 100% sure what you mean but if you hold down the Alt key when placing a part it will only attach with the nodes i.e. surface attachment is disabled.
You can hold the ALT/CMD button while trying to attaching it to the node so it will only attach on a node while holding down the ALT/CMD button

ok, thank you

the problem is, that this thing wont attach to the node, only to the surface :/

i had workaround the problem:
i had build the satelit on the nose from the vehicle, then it had attached without problems...
You probably need to rotate/flip the bay before alt-attaching it. It's probably facing the wrong direction for the alt-click purpose.

Rotate the camera around so you're seeing your attachment from "the side." The editor seems to not like it when you're trying to node-attach things when looking at a node end-on. Seems to happen more in the SPH than the VAB, since you're more likely to point the camera end-on at a node in the SPH than the VAB.
